name: Making Care Easier
overview:
Making Care Easier (MCE) gives caregivers a free, permanent home to coordinate care and find the products, services and professionals they need to help make caring for the elderly easier. Plus, we provide tools for professional caregivers to reach out to their clients and their families and increase sales.

MCE’s online and mobile solutions are about more than just storing and sharing information (which we do), but about helping everyone in the family take an active part in caring-no matter how far apart they are.

Our care coordination solutions allow families to find and then buy situation recommended products and services; track daily care updates; create and securely store care and emergency plans; find actionable how-to’s and reach out to family, friends and professionals for help. From “how and who will help upgrade mom’s toilet to a handicap accessible one” to “how and who can help pay for dad’s bars in his bathtub,” MCE helps manage everyday living. The result – improved communication, better managed care, more efficiency, and less stress.
